name: CIPP-API Integration
helpText: This integration allows you to use to enable API access outside of CIPP usage. Requires Global Administrator permissions inside your tenant for activation of the API. These credentials will only be shown once.

SettingOptions.name: cippapi.ResetPassword
SettingOptions.label: Reset application secret - this will invalidate all existing API tokens

name: Gradient Integration
helpText: This integration allows you to send your license counts to Gradient for billing purposes, and create tickets if your PSA supports ticket creation by Gradient.

SettingOptions.name: Gradient.APIKey
SettingOptions.label: Gradient Partner API Key
SettingOptions.placeholder: Enter your Gradient Partner Key. Leave blank to keep your current key.

SettingOptions.name: Gradient.BillingEnabled
SettingOptions.label: Enable sending all license information to Gradient

name: Halo PSA Ticketing Integration
helpText: This integration allows you to send alerts to your ticketing system.

SettingOptions.name: HaloPSA.ResourceURL
SettingOptions.label: HaloPSA Resource Server URL
SettingOptions.placeholder: Enter your HaloPSA Resource Server URL.

SettingOptions.name: HaloPSA.AuthURL
SettingOptions.label: HaloPSA Authorisation Endpoint URL
SettingOptions.placeholder: Enter your HaloPSA Authorisation Endpoint URL.

SettingOptions.name: HaloPSA.APIKey
SettingOptions.label: HaloPSA Client Secret
SettingOptions.placeholder: Enter your client Secret. Leave blank to keep your current key.

name: NinjaOne Integration
helpText: This integration allows you to populate custom fields with Tenant information, monitor device compliance state, document other items and generate relationships inside NinjaOne. This intgration requires a machine to machine (client_credentials) API application with the monitoring and management grants.

SettingOptions.name: NinjaOne.ClientID
SettingOptions.label: NinjaOne API Client ID
SettingOptions.placeholder: Enter your NinjaOne API Client ID

SettingOptions.name: NinjaOne.TEMPSECRETCHANGEME
SettingOptions.label: NinjaOne API Client Secret
SettingOptions.placeholder: Enter your NinjaOne API Client Secret

SettingOptions.name: NinjaOne.TenantCustomFields
SettingOptions.label: Generate Tenant Information into Global Custom Fields

SettingOptions.name: NinjaOne.DeviceCompliance
SettingOptions.label: Populate a Device Custom Field with compliance status
